author: bsunanda
body:
#### PR description:

Use of the modifier run3_geomOld to use GT's with old geometry versions

#### PR validation:

Use the new cfg's to test old and new geometries from DB

#### if this PR is a backport please specify the original PR and why you need to backport that PR:

title: Run3-sim108 Use of the modifier run3_geomOld to use GT's with old geometry versions
